item.description: Come say a a last goodbye to the death of the 2011 season The first unofficial wake for the season will be this Saturday, October 15 In a place well know for it's bad spirits-Salem MA We will be attending the 2011 Salem Harvest at the Knights of Columbus Hall With samples of wine, beer & mead 2 Sessions The Afternoon session is from 2-4:30 The Evening Session is from 5:30-8 giving you plenty of time to explore the other Haunts of Salem either beforehand or afterwards and get rid of any lingering curses Tickets are $25 in advance at salemharvestfest.com or $30 at the door I'll see you at the haunted evening session for those who dare to make it.
item.name: Come Celebrate the Spirits of the Season
